title: Broke the Screen on Pixel 2 (Completely Dead), how can I access secure apps like Password Manager?
content:
My Pixel 2 fell and the screen is completely dead. I already got a Pixel 4a and successfully moved my files and apps. My problem is with two apps:
Google Authenticator
BlackBerry Password Keeper

I moved apps and backed things up by enabling USB Debugging and managing the full fully from my laptop. However, those two apps above don't load when mirroring the screen. I can't find a way around this.

I just want to access them to back the details there and then import them to the apps on the new phone.

Any suggestions?
